name: DESTROY everything
description:
Do the opposite of taking care of people and ATTACK EVERYBODY AND TAKE THEIR MONEY!!!

This was developed in 3 days for the Extra Credits Game Jam 6.

Note: This is my first game released that is made in Unity! I have been learning Unity for 3 weeks now and I have learnt a lot and it is great fun. I tried to focus on making the gameplay satisfying to play, so apologies for how short the game is! I am slowly learning and improving!

Controls:
Move -  keys A & D
Attack - left click
Note: Try not to miss or you will need time to reset your attack!
